application_type_full: Tree works: Trees in conservation areas/subject to TPOs
description: Lime  (applicants ref. G1) - Crown lift to clear footpath by 5 meters. Standing in Area A2 of Tree Preservation Order. (amended description)Mixed species Mainly Holly (applicants ref. G2) - Cut back to level with retain wall to 4 meters to clear. Remaining trees, Chestnut , Holme Oak, cut back to lift 5.5 meters for high side vehicles on main road. Standing in Area A1 of Tree Preservation Order. 1 x Sycamore (applicants ref. T4) - Remove 2 Lateral branches over garage. Standing in G1 of Tree Preservation Order.1 x Sycamore (applicants ref. T5) -  Remove 1 lateral branch over garage. Standing in G2 of Tree Preservation Order.3 x Ash (applicants ref. G6) - Reduce vertical and lateral growth by 2-3 meters approx to clear car park bays. Standing in Area A2 of Tree Preservation Order.
